channel.title: [317] Making a certian Area Safe PKing
channel.description: A simple rather confusing question for me is How could I make a pking area to where only that area doesn't make u lose ur items but the other pking areas do?

Dude I can’t find anything I need somebody to make this for me I’ve made the actual Pkbox I just can’t make it to where it’s wildy because it’s confusing as hell.

Read full topic
